extension.summary: Kodi remote debugging support for Visual Studio Code.
extension.description: Kodi wrapper for the Visual Studio/Visual Studio Code debugpy library by Microsoft. Kodi wrapper by Psychosaurian.[CR][CR]The version number of this addon matches the version of debugpy included. See usage instructions in addon directory or at:[CR][CR]https://github.com/Psychosaurian/script.module.debugpy
extension.disclaimer: debugpy is the work of Microsoft.
